recipe.title: Green Peas in Cream
ingredients: 3 cups fresh peas (shelled from 3 to 6 pounds peas in pods) or thawed frozen peas (1 pound)
1 tablespoon finely chopped chervil, chives, or mint
instructions: Bring a large heavy saucepan of salted water (4 teaspoons salt for 2 quarts water) to a rolling boil, then slowly add peas so water maintains a boil. Stir in sugar and cook peas, uncovered, until tender, 5 to 12 minutes, depending on size of peas.

Boil cream in saucepan until reduced by half, 2 to 3 minutes. Add butter, peas, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, and salt to taste and cook over medium heat, stirring, until butter is melted and peas are warmed through. Stir in chervil.
